events.name: Oaxaca Music Expo
events.description: A music expo celebrating local talent. DJ Alow presented a special tribal-house mix.

events.name: Future Sound Showcase
events.description: A showcase introducing upcoming DJs. DJ Alow premiered 3 unreleased tracks.

events.name: Night Pulse Club Party
events.description: Private club event featuring local DJs, where DJ Alow delivered a hard-techno set that lit up the night.

events.name: Neon Night Experience
events.description: High-energy neon party with lights, lasers, and DJ Alow headlining the night session.

events.name: ElectroWave Arena
events.description: A massive arena event with over 5,000 attendees. DJ Alow performed a 1-hour live remix set.

events.name: Bass Storm Party
events.description: Underground bass event where DJ Alow collaborated with two other DJs for a dual-stage rotation set.

events.name: Electric Garden Fest
events.description: Outdoor event surrounded by people, with a melodic techno performance from DJ Alow.

events.name: Rave Under the Stars
events.description: A nighttime rave in the mountains with a breathtaking atmosphere and an energetic closing set.
